verses.verse: To the angel <S%G32><s%> of the church <S%G1577><s%> of Ephesus <S%G2181><s%> write; <S%G1125><s%> These <S%G3592><s%> things said <S%G3004><s%> he that holds <S%G2902><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> stars <S%G792><s%> in his right <S%G1188><s%> hand, who <S%G3588><s%> walks <S%G4043><s%> in the middle <S%G3319><s%> of the seven <S%G2033><s%> golden <S%G5552><s%> candlesticks; <S%G3087><s%>

I know <S%G1492><s%> your works, <S%G2041><s%> and your labor, <S%G2873><s%> and your patience, <S%G5281><s%> and how <S%G3754><s%> you can <S%G1410><s%> not bear <S%G941><s%> them which are evil: <S%G2556><s%> and you have tried <S%G3985><s%> them which say <S%G5335><s%> they are apostles, <S%G652><s%> and are not, and have found <S%G2147><s%> them liars: <S%G5571><s%>
And have borne, <S%G941><s%> and have <S%G2192><s%> patience, <S%G5281><s%> and for my name's <S%G3686><s%> sake have labored, <S%G2872><s%> and have not fainted. <S%G2577><s%>
Nevertheless <S%G235><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> somewhat against <S%G2596><s%> you, because <S%G3754><s%> you have left <S%G863><s%> your first <S%G4413><s%> love. <S%G26><s%>

Remember <S%G3421><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> from where <S%G4159><s%> you are <S%G1488><s%> fallen, <S%G1601><s%> and repent, <S%G3340><s%> and do <S%G4160><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> works; <S%G2041><s%> or <S%G1161><s%> else <S%G1490><s%> I will come <S%G2064><s%> to you quickly, <S%G5035><s%> and will remove <S%G2795><s%> your candlestick <S%G3087><s%> out of his place, <S%G5117><s%> except <S%G3362><s%> you repent. <S%G3340><s%>
But this <S%G5124><s%> you have, <S%G2192><s%> that you hate <S%G3404><s%> the deeds <S%G2041><s%> of the Nicolaitanes, <S%G3531><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I also <S%G2504><s%> hate. <S%G3404><s%>

He that has <S%G2192><s%> an ear, <S%G3775><s%> let him hear <S%G191><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to the churches; <S%G1577><s%> To him that overcomes <S%G3528><s%> will I give <S%G1325><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> of the tree <S%G3586><s%> of life, <S%G2222><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is in the middle <S%G3319><s%> of the paradise <S%G3857><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And to the angel <S%G32><s%> of the church <S%G1577><s%> in Smyrna <S%G4668><s%> write; <S%G1125><s%> These <S%G3592><s%> things said <S%G3004><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> and the last, <S%G2078><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> was dead, <S%G3498><s%> and is alive; <S%G2198><s%>

I know <S%G1492><s%> your works, <S%G2041><s%> and tribulation, <S%G2347><s%> and poverty, <S%G4432><s%> (but you are <S%G1488><s%> rich) <S%G4145><s%> and I know the blasphemy <S%G988><s%> of them which <S%G3588><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> they are Jews, <S%G2453><s%> and are not, but are the synagogue <S%G4864><s%> of Satan. <S%G4567><s%>

Fear <S%G5399><s%> none <S%G3367><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> things which <S%G3739><s%> you shall suffer: <S%G3958><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%> shall cast <S%G906><s%> some of you into <S%G1519><s%> prison, <S%G5438><s%> that you may be tried; <S%G3985><s%> and you shall have <S%G2192><s%> tribulation <S%G2347><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> days: <S%G2250><s%> be you faithful <S%G4103><s%> to death, <S%G2288><s%> and I will give <S%G1325><s%> you a crown <S%G4735><s%> of life. <S%G2222><s%>

He that has <S%G2192><s%> an ear, <S%G3775><s%> let him hear <S%G191><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to the churches; <S%G1577><s%> He that overcomes <S%G3528><s%> shall not be hurt <S%G91><s%> of the second <S%G1208><s%> death. <S%G2288><s%>

And to the angel <S%G32><s%> of the church <S%G1577><s%> in Pergamos <S%G4010><s%> write; <S%G1125><s%> These <S%G3592><s%> things said <S%G3004><s%> he which has <S%G2192><s%> the sharp <S%G3691><s%> sword <S%G4501><s%> with two <S%G1366><s%> edges; <S%G1366><s%>

I know <S%G1492><s%> your works, <S%G2041><s%> and where <S%G4226><s%> you dwell, <S%G2730><s%> even where <S%G3699><s%> Satan's <S%G4567><s%> seat <S%G2362><s%> is : and you hold <S%G2902><s%> fast my name, <S%G3686><s%> and have not denied <S%G720><s%> my faith, <S%G4102><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> in those <S%G3588><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3757><s%> Antipas <S%G493><s%> was my faithful <S%G4103><s%> martyr, <S%G3144><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> was slain <S%G615><s%> among <S%G3844><s%> you, where <S%G3699><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> dwells. <S%G2730><s%>

But I have <S%G2192><s%> a few <S%G3641><s%> things against <S%G2596><s%> you, because <S%G3754><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> them that hold <S%G2902><s%> the doctrine <S%G1322><s%> of Balaam, <S%G903><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> taught <S%G1321><s%> Balac <S%G904><s%> to cast <S%G906><s%> a stumbling block <S%G4625><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of Israel, <S%G2474><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> things sacrificed <S%G1494><s%> to idols, <S%G1494><s%> and to commit <S%G4203><s%> fornication. <S%G4203><s%>
So <S%G3779><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> you also <S%G2532><s%> them that hold <S%G2902><s%> the doctrine <S%G1322><s%> of the Nicolaitanes, <S%G3531><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> thing I hate. <S%G3404><s%>

Repent; <S%G3340><s%> or <S%G1161><s%> else <S%G1490><s%> I will come <S%G2064><s%> to you quickly, <S%G5035><s%> and will fight <S%G4170><s%> against <S%G3326><s%> them with the sword <S%G4501><s%> of my mouth. <S%G4750><s%>

He that has <S%G2192><s%> an ear, <S%G3775><s%> let him hear <S%G191><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to the churches; <S%G1577><s%> To him that overcomes <S%G3528><s%> will I give <S%G1325><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> of the hidden <S%G2928><s%> manna, <S%G3131><s%> and will give <S%G1325><s%> him a white <S%G3022><s%> stone, <S%G5586><s%> and in the stone <S%G5586><s%> a new <S%G2537><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> written, <S%G1125><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> knows <S%G1097><s%> saving <S%G1508><s%> he that receives <S%G2983><s%> it.

And to the angel <S%G32><s%> of the church <S%G1577><s%> in Thyatira <S%G2363><s%> write; <S%G1125><s%> These <S%G3592><s%> things said <S%G3004><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> his eyes <S%G3788><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> to a flame <S%G5395><s%> of fire, <S%G4442><s%> and his feet <S%G4228><s%> are like <S%G3664><s%> fine brass; <S%G5474><s%>

I know <S%G1492><s%> your works, <S%G2041><s%> and charity, <S%G26><s%> and service, <S%G1248><s%> and faith, <S%G4102><s%> and your patience, <S%G5281><s%> and your works; <S%G2041><s%> and the last <S%G2078><s%> to be more <S%G4119><s%> than the first. <S%G4413><s%>

Notwithstanding <S%G235><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> a few <S%G3641><s%> things against <S%G2596><s%> you, because <S%G3754><s%> you suffer <S%G1439><s%> that woman <S%G1135><s%> Jezebel, <S%G2403><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> calls <S%G3004><s%> herself <S%G1438><s%> a prophetess, <S%G4398><s%> to teach <S%G1321><s%> and to seduce <S%G4105><s%> my servants <S%G1401><s%> to commit <S%G4203><s%> fornication, <S%G4203><s%> and to eat <S%G5315><s%> things sacrificed <S%G1494><s%> to idols. <S%G1494><s%>
And I gave <S%G1325><s%> her space <S%G5550><s%> to repent <S%G3340><s%> of her fornication; <S%G4202><s%> and she repented <S%G3340><s%> not.

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I will cast <S%G906><s%> her into <S%G1519><s%> a bed, <S%G2825><s%> and them that commit <S%G3431><s%> adultery <S%G3431><s%> with her into <S%G1519><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> tribulation, <S%G2347><s%> except <S%G3362><s%> they repent <S%G3340><s%> of their deeds. <S%G2041><s%>

And I will kill <S%G615><s%> her children <S%G5043><s%> with death; <S%G2288><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the churches <S%G1577><s%> shall know <S%G1097><s%> that I am <S%G1510><s%> he which <S%G3739><s%> searches <S%G2045><s%> the reins <S%G3510><s%> and hearts: <S%G2588><s%> and I will give <S%G1325><s%> to every <S%G1538><s%> one of you according <S%G2596><s%> to your <S%G5216><s%> works. <S%G2041><s%>

But to you I say, <S%G3004><s%> and to the rest <S%G3062><s%> in Thyatira, <S%G2363><s%> as many <S%G3745><s%> as have <S%G2192><s%> not this <S%G5026><s%> doctrine, <S%G1322><s%> and which <S%G3748><s%> have not known <S%G1097><s%> the depths <S%G899><s%> of Satan, <S%G4567><s%> as they speak; <S%G3004><s%> I will put <S%G906><s%> on you none <S%G3367><s%> other <S%G243><s%> burden. <S%G922><s%>
But that which you have <S%G2192><s%> already hold <S%G2902><s%> fast till <S%G891><s%> I come. <S%G2240><s%>

And he that overcomes, <S%G3528><s%> and keeps <S%G5083><s%> my works <S%G2041><s%> to the end, <S%G5056><s%> to him will I give <S%G1325><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> the nations: <S%G1484><s%>

And he shall rule <S%G4165><s%> them with a rod <S%G4464><s%> of iron; <S%G4603><s%> as the vessels <S%G4632><s%> of a potter <S%G2764><s%> shall they be broken <S%G4937><s%> to shivers: <S%G4937><s%> even <S%G2504><s%> as I received <S%G2983><s%> of my Father. <S%G3962><s%>
And I will give <S%G1325><s%> him the morning <S%G4407><s%> star. <S%G792><s%>
He that has <S%G2192><s%> an ear, <S%G3775><s%> let him hear <S%G191><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to the churches. <S%G1577><s%>
